title: ArianeGroup Completes Key Prometheus Hot Fire Test
summary:
ArianeGroup completed a successful hot fire test of the Prometheus rocket engine in late December 2024. The engine is being developed under a European Space Agency (ESA) contract and is designed to power reusable rockets. In his initial address during the annual press briefing on 9 January, ESA Director General Josef Aschbacher stated that a […]
